ygData.subject: David and the rest of the list
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry I have not been able to reply, I have not been home.  I did not mean for that message to go on the list (I mixed things up somehow).  I emailed that
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry I have not been able to reply, I have not been home. I did not mean
for that message to go on the list (I mixed things up somehow). I emailed
that message because her and one of her friends sent me private emails. I
don't know about you folks, but I hate getting private emails from people I
don't know, especially emails that are just sent to talk down to the
recipient (namly me). Again my apologies.

N.H.
